would normally wash your sweater the sample was round round wet blocked soaked in cold water with no-rinse rs right side soap pressed with a clean dry towel and left flat to air dry pin the swatch to enlarge it so that you get single_crochet single_crochet 16 sts and 18 row per 4 x 4 inches 10 16 x 10 16 cm single_crochet 2 together counts as 1 after it dries single_crochet insert hk in first indicated st yo and pull up a lp 2 lps on hk insert complete the gauge swatch following the decrease hk in next indicated st yo and pull directions below block it as directed above then up a lp 3 lps on hk yo and pull take measurements from the center of your swatch through all lps on hk and make sure your post-blocking gauge matches skip skip the pattern gauge slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch 2 together counts as 1 slip_stitch insert hk in first indicated st going from front to back then insert slst2tog hk in next indicated st going from back to front yo and pull through all lps on hk st stitch tch turning chain yo yarn over ws wrong side dewdrop sweater 2024 pattern and design by crochethighway all rights reserved 5 row 1 rs chain 22 and working in back bump of chs photos 1-2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk and in each chain across photos 3-4 turn 21 single_crochet photo 9 photo 10 photo 1 photo 2 photo 11 photo 12 repeat row 2-3 10 more times until you have a total of 23 row photo 3 photo 4 row 2 chain 1 does not count as st here and throughout half_double_crochet in first st slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet in next st across turn row 3 chain 1 slip_stitch in first st photos 5-7 half_double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st across turn photos 8-12 photo 13 measuring the gauge swatch 16 stitches and 18 photo 5 photo 6 row per 4 x 4 inches 10 16 x 10 16 cm each bump formed by a half_double_crochet represents 2 stitches and 2 row photo 7 photo 8 dewdrop sweater 2024 pattern and design by crochethighway all rights reserved 6 this sweater is designed to be worn with 6-12 inches 15-30 cm of positive ease around the bust when choosing a size find your actual bust size measurement a by measuring around the fullest part of your bust while wearing any undergarments you plan on wearing under your crocheted sweater the finished bust/hip circumference measurement b will be larger by anywhere between 6 to 12 inches 15 to 25 cm than your actual bust measurement the model has a 40-inch 101-cm bust and is wearing size 4 with 12
